Name: the Lothian League
Description: Founded in 2691 by Taurian patriots being pursued by the Star League Defense Force during the Reunification War, the Lothian League is currently led by its Grand Mistress, Dame Lorelei Logan. The League follows a neutrality policy and isolation from the politics of the Inner Sphere, and keeps friendly relations with both of its Periphery neighbors, the Illyrian Palatinate and the Circinus Federation.
ReputationStatements: I trust your services to be worth their cost, mercenary.

MissionSuccessStatements: Your ruler is pleased, and your bank account will be credited accordingly. Fare well, mercenary.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: I am not pleased with the overall result, but despite the circumstances not being ideal you put some real effort.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Again? Mercenary, just leave my presence and take your company with you.
